tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MentalHealthLibrary (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_title VARCHAR(100),
    resource_description TEXT,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    publication_date DATE,
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    is_verified BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    content TEXT,
    published_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE staff_resources (staff_id INT, resource_id INT, resource_name VARCHAR(255), content TEXT)
CREATE TABLE patient_resources (patient_id INT, resource_id INT, resource_name VARCHAR(255), content TEXT)
CREATE TABLE resource_tags (tag_id INT, resource_id INT, tag_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE resource_reviews (review_id INT, resource_id INT, rating INT, review_text TEXT)

CREATE TABLE MentalHealthResources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    category VARCHAR(50) NULL,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
    diagnosis TEXT
);
